metadata.title: Steller Sea Lion Counts

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS)

metadata.description: A compilation of counts of Steller sea lions observed on land at sites along the north Pacific rim from 1958 to the present. Annual summer counts (collected periodically since 1958) made at 151 locations in the Aleutians and Gulf of Alaska are machine-readable format.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To report on the Steller sea lion counts.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: Check with Source.

Use constraints: Check with Source.
